data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Abolafia, Joaquín, Divsalar, Nafiseh, Panahi, Hadi, Shokoohi, Ebrahim (2014): Description of Paracrobeles deserticola sp. n. and Nothacrobeles hebetocaudatus sp. n. (Nematoda: Rhabditida: Cephalobidae) from Iran and the phylogenetic relationships of these two species. Zootaxa 3827 (1): 1-19, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3827.1.1
